author: sujonali1819
created_time: August 25, 2023, 05:29:33 PMLast edit: August 29, 2023, 04:06:36 PM by sujonali1819
content: WorkAsPro is the world’s first Blockchain-Based Freelancing Platform. The future of freelance is now. Earn and pay with crypto with efficient transactions and robust protections through smart contracts wherever you are based. Recently they have successfully finished their bounty campaign. And now they want to launch a signature campaign to spread the WorkAsPro Brand awareness all over the forum.Rules and Requirements Participants feel free to keep discussion on in the WorkAsPro Ann thread.You must wear the appropriate Signature, Avatar to be eligible for paymentA minimum 15 constructive posts each week must be done. If you fail to meet the minimum you will not get any payment for that week.Less than 150 characters long post will not be countedThe posts are in Off-Topic, Archival, Games and Rounds, Politics & Society,  Press, Local Board, posts in any bounty and signature campaign thread, and Posts where signature does not show are not counted as eligible.If you fail to make the minimum posts two weeks in a row, you will be removedYou can not make posts with AI-generated text. If you do you will be marked as an abuser and blacklisted from any type of my campaigns Any type of spamming or burst posting is not allowedIf you are tagged by any DT with a Legitimate reason you are not eligible to apply for this campaignYou will be removed without any payment if you get a negative tag during enrolling in this campaignYou must only use the WorkAsPro signature in your profile. You can not use other projects' signatures.Alternative accounts are not allowed. If we find you are enrolling with more than one bitcointalk account. You will be removed and taggedWorkAsPro reserves the right to disqualify any users / change any rules at any timeAs a campaign manager I reserve the right to disqualify any user and change any rules at any time Particiapnts will be paid directly to their Bitcoin address.Local Board posts will not be counted as eligible.Payouts & Positions:4x Hero/Legendary members -   $50 worth of IDEA token / week 5x Sr members -   $35 worth of IDEA token  / week 6x Full members -   $25 worth of IDEA token / week 5x Member -   $15 worth of IDEA token / week PaydayThe weekly payment will be sent to your ERC20 Wallet address every Thursday(weekly period Thursday to Tuesday).Posts after 23:59 UTC Thursday will be counted towards the following week.AvatarLink : https://imgur.com/6fSJtEJSignaturesHero
